snippet: Seven people were killed and six wounded after a man left a bomb with 10 pounds of explosives in baggage in a passenger van in Peshawar.
abstract: Seven people are killed and six wounded in Peshawar, Pakistan, from bomb rigged to a timer with 10 pounds of explosives in baggage in a passenger van.
lead_paragraph: Seven people were killed and six wounded after a man left a bomb with 10 pounds of explosives in baggage in a passenger van in Peshawar.

headline.main: Bombing in Pakistan and a Wave of Attempts Point to a New Drive by Militants
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Attack on Van Leaves 7 Dead in Peshawar
